title: A matterless double slit
abstract: Double slits provide incoming particles with a choice. Those that survive passage through the slits have chosen from two possible paths, which interfere to distribute them in a wave-like manner. Such wave–particle duality continues to be challenged and investigated in a broad range of disciplines with electrons, neutrons, helium atoms, C60 fullerenes, Bose–Einstein condensates and biological molecules. All variants have hitherto involved material constituents. We present a matterless double-slit scenario in which photons generated from virtual electron–positron pair annihilation in head-on collisions of a probe laser field with two ultra-intense laser beams form a double-slit interference pattern. Such electromagnetic fields are predicted to induce material-like behaviour in vacuum, supporting elastic scattering between photons. Our double-slit scenario presents, on the one hand, a realizable method with which to observe photon–photon scattering and, on the other hand, demonstrates the possibility of both controlling light with light and non-locally investigating features of the quantum vacuum structure.
abstract_cn: 双缝隙为进入的颗粒提供了选择。那些通过狭缝而幸存的生物已经从两条可能的路径中进行了选择，它们会干扰以波浪状分布它们。这种波的对偶性继续受到挑战，并在电子，中子，氦原子，C 60富勒烯，玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚物和生物分子的广泛学科中受到研究。迄今为止，所有变体都涉及材料成分。我们提出了一种无关紧要的双缝方案，在这种情况下，由虚拟电子正电子对an灭所产生的光子在探测激光场与两个超强激光束的正面碰撞中会形成双缝干涉图案。预计此类电磁场会在真空中诱导类似材料的行为，从而支持光子之间的弹性散射。我们的双狭缝方案一方面提供了一种可实现的方法，用于观察光子的光子散射，另一方面，它展示了既可以用光控制光又可以通过非局部研究量子的特征来控制光的可能性。真空结构。

title: Highly power-efficient quantum cascade lasers
title_cn: 高效功率量子级联激光器
abstract: Quantum cascade lasers are promising mid-infrared semiconductor light sources for molecular detection in applications such as environmental sensing or medical diagnostics. For such applications, researchers have been striving to improve device performance. Recently, improvements in wall plug efficiency have been pursued with a view to realizing compact, portable, power-efficient and high-power quantum cascade laser systems. However, advances have largely been incremental, and the basic quantum design has remained unchanged for many years, with the wall plug efficiency yet to reach above 35%. A crucial factor in quantum cascade laser performance is the efficient transport of electrons into the laser active regions. We recently theoretically described this transport process as limited by the interface-roughness-induced detuning of resonant tunnelling. Here, we report that an ‘ultrastrong coupling’ design strategy overcomes this limiting factor and leads to the experimental realization of quantum cascade lasers with 40–50% wall plug efficiency when operated in pulsed mode at temperatures of 160 K or lower.
abstract_cn: 量子级联激光器是有前途的中红外半导体光源，可用于环境检测或医学诊断等应用中的分子检测。对于此类应用，研究人员一直在努力提高设备性能。最近，为了实现紧凑的，便携式的，功率有效的和高功率的量子级联激光器系统，已经寻求提高壁塞效率。但是，进步很大程度上是渐进的，并且基本的量子设计多年来一直保持不变，壁塞效率尚未达到35％以上。量子级联激光器性能的关键因素是电子向激光器有源区的有效传输。我们最近在理论上将这种传输过程描述为受到共振隧道效应的界面粗糙度引起的失谐的限制。在此，我们报告“超强耦合”。设计策略克服了这一限制因素，并实现了在160°K或更低的温度下以脉冲模式工作时具有40＆＃8211; 50％壁塞效率的量子级联激光器的实验实现。

title: Quantum cascade lasers that emit more light than heat
title_cn: 量子级联激光器发出的光多于热量
abstract: For any semiconductor lasers, the wall plug efficiency, that is, the portion of the injected electrical energy that can be converted into output optical energy, is one of the most important figures of merit. A device with a higher wall plug efficiency has a lower power demand and prolonged device lifetime due to its reduced self-heating. Since its invention, the power performance of the quantum cascade laser has improved tremendously. However, although the internal quantum efficiency can be engineered to be greater than 80% at low temperatures, the wall plug efficiency of a quantum cascade laser has never been demonstrated above 50% at any temperature. The best wall plug efficiency reported to date is 36% at 120 K (ref. ). Here, we overcome the limiting factors using a single-well injector design and demonstrate 53% wall plug efficiency at 40 K with an emitting wavelength of 5 µm. In other words, we demonstrate a quantum cascade laser that produces more light than heat.
abstract_cn: 对于任何半导体激光器，壁塞效率（即可以转换为输出光能的注入电能的一部分）是最重要的品质因数之一。具有较高壁塞效率的设备由于减少了自身发热而具有较低的功率需求并延长了设备寿命。自发明以来，量子级联激光器的功率性能已大大提高。但是，尽管可以将内部量子效率设计为在低温下大于80％，但从未在任何温度下证明量子级联激光器的壁塞效率超过50％。迄今为止，报告的最佳墙塞效率为120 K（参考值）时为36％。在这里，我们克服了使用单井进样器设计的限制因素，并证明了在40 K下发射波长为5 m的壁塞效率为53％。换句话说，我们演示了一种量子级联激光器，它产生的光多于热量。</ p>

title: Airy–Bessel wave packets as versatile linear light bullets
title_cn: 艾里-贝塞尔波包作为多功能线性光弹
abstract: The generation of spatiotemporal optical wave packets that are impervious to both dispersion and diffraction has been a fascinating challenge. Despite intense research activity, such localized waves, referred to as light bullets, have remained elusive. In nonlinear propagation, three-dimensional light bullets tend to disintegrate as a result of inherent instabilities. Three-dimensional wave packets that propagate linearly have been reported, but their utility is severely limited by the need to tailor the wave packet precisely to material properties. To overcome these limitations, we explore a new approach based on the one-dimensional Airy wave packet. Here, we report the first observation of a class of versatile three-dimensional linear light bullets, which combine Bessel beams in the transverse plane with temporal Airy pulses. Their evolution does not depend critically on the material in which they propagate, and the consequent versatility will facilitate their study and applications ranging from bioimaging to plasma physics.
abstract_cn: 时空光波包的产生对于色散和衍射都是不可渗透的，这是一个令人着迷的挑战。尽管进行了大量的研究活动，但这种被称为轻子弹的局域波仍然难以捉摸。在非线性传播中，三维光弹由于固有的不稳定性而趋于分解。已经报道了线性传播的三维波包，但是由于需要根据材料特性精确地定制波包而严重限制了它们的实用性。为了克服这些限制，我们探索了一种基于一维艾里波包的新方法。在这里，我们报告了对一类通用的三维线性轻子弹的首次观察，该子弹将横向平面中的贝塞尔光束与瞬时艾里脉冲相结合。它们的进化并不严格取决于它们所传播的材料，因此其多功能性将促进它们的研究和应用，从生物成像到等离子体物理学。

title: Active magneto-plasmonics in hybrid metal–ferromagnet structures
title_cn: 混合金属-铁磁体结构中的有源磁等离子体
abstract: Surface-plasmon-mediated confinement of optical fields holds great promise for on-chip miniaturization of all-optical circuits. Following successful demonstrations of passive nanoplasmonic devices, active plasmonic systems have been designed to control plasmon propagation. This goal has been achieved either by coupling plasmons to optically active materials or by making use of transient optical nonlinearities in metals via strong excitation with ultrashort laser pulses. Here, we present a new concept in which the active optical component is a metal–ferromagnet–metal structure. It is based on active magneto-plasmonic microinterferometry, where the surface plasmon wave vector in a gold–ferromagnet–gold trilayer system is controlled using a weak external magnetic field. Application of this new technique allows measurement of the electromagnetic field distribution inside a metal at optical frequencies and with nanometre depth resolution. Significant modulation depth combined with possible all-optical magnetization reversal induced by femtosecond light pulses opens a route to ultrafast magneto-plasmonic switching.
abstract_cn: 表面等离激元介导的光场限制对于全光电路的片上微型化具有广阔的前景。在成功演示了无源纳米等离激元设备之后，有源等离激元系统已被设计来控制等离激元的传播。通过将等离激元耦合到光学活性材料上，或通过利用超短激光脉冲的强激发，利用金属中的瞬态光学非线性来实现此目标。在这里，我们提出了一个新的概念，其中有源光学组件是金属＆＃8211;铁磁体＆＃8211;金属结构。它基于有源磁等离子体微干涉技术，其中使用弱外部磁场控制金铁磁体和金三层系统中的表面等离子体波矢量。这项新技术的应用允许以光频率和纳米深度分辨率测量金属内部的电磁场分布。飞秒光脉冲引起的显着调制深度和可能的全光磁化反转为超快磁-等离子体切换提供了一条途径。

title: Coherent excitation of Rydberg atoms in micrometre-sized atomic vapour cells
title_cn: 微米级原子蒸气池中里德堡原子的相干激发
abstract: The coherent control of mesoscopic ensembles of atoms and Rydberg atom blockade are the basis for proposed quantum devices such as integrable gates and single-photon sources. To date, experimental progress has been limited to complex experimental set-ups that use ultracold atoms. Here, we show that coherence times of ∼100 ns are achievable with coherent Rydberg atom spectroscopy in micrometre-sized thermal vapour cells. We investigate states with principle quantum numbers between 30 and 50. Our results demonstrate that microcells with a size on the order of the blockade radius (∼2 µm), at temperatures of 100–300 °C, are robust and promising candidates for investigating low-dimensional strongly interacting Rydberg gases, constructing quantum gates and building single-photon sources.

title: Ultrabroad-bandwidth arbitrary radiofrequency waveform generation with a silicon photonic chip-based spectral shaper
title_cn: 利用基于硅光子芯片的频谱整形器生成超宽带任意射频波形
abstract: Ultrabroad-bandwidth radiofrequency pulses offer significant applications potential, such as increased data transmission rate and multipath tolerance in wireless communications. Such ultrabroad-bandwidth pulses are inherently difficult to generate with chip-based electronics due to limits in digital-to-analog converter technology and high timing jitter. Photonic means of radiofrequency waveform generation, for example, by spectral shaping and frequency–time mapping, can overcome the bandwidth limit in electronic generation. However, previous bulk optic systems for radiofrequency arbitrary waveform generation do not offer the integration advantage of electronics. Here, we report a chip-scale, fully programmable spectral shaper consisting of cascaded multiple-channel microring resonators, on a silicon photonics platform that is compatible with electronic integrated circuit technology. Using such a spectral shaper, we demonstrate the generation of burst radiofrequency waveforms with programmable time-dependent amplitude, frequency and phase profiles, for frequencies up to 60 GHz. Our demonstration suggests potential for chip-scale photonic generation of ultrabroad-bandwidth arbitrary radiofrequency waveforms.
abstract_cn: 超宽带射频脉冲具有巨大的应用潜力，例如无线通信中提高的数据传输速率和多径容限。由于数模转换器技术的局限性和高时序抖动，这种基于芯片的电子设备固有地难以产生这种超宽带脉冲。射频波形产生的光子手段，例如通过频谱整形和频率时间映射，可以克服电子产生中的带宽限制。但是，以前的用于产生射频任意波形的体视光学系统没有提供电子设备的集成优势。在这里，我们在与电子集成电路技术兼容的硅光子平台上报告了由级联多通道微环谐振器组成的芯片级，完全可编程的频谱整形器。使用这样的频谱整形器，我们演示了突发射频波形的产生，该突发射频波形具有可编程的与时间有关的幅度，频率和相位曲线，适用于高达60＆＃160 GHz的频率。我们的演示表明，芯片级光子产生超宽带任意射频波形的潜力。
